MajorClaims.Text: if the good people always get an happy ending, I don’t think it’s proper
movies and TV programs should present different stories in which good people get reward or get nothing

Claims.Text: we can’t always let good people be rewarded in movies or TV programs
if children always watch the TV programs that good people get rewarded, they may think it will be true in the real world
we should show people the truth in the stories

Premises.Text: if all the story end up in the same way, it will be boring
If good people always win, we can guess the ending of the movies or dramas
Then we will feel less interested in them
But if the good people are not always rewarded, we will try to finish the movie or dramas to find out the end of the story
Hollywood stories usually have a happy ending like a hero beats a crime and get a girl
But now many people, including me, have been tired with it
I don’t want to see the same kind of ending again and again
They will be misleading by those movies
they may act like good people in order to get reward
Once they find the good people are not always get rewarded, they may feel upset and not to be a good person
the good people do good things no matter the ending is good or not
we should tell this to the young children to avoid the misunderstanding
Even in the real world, good people can get a bad ending sometimes
it happen more often in the real world than in those movies
those good endings sometimes are helpful
Some people may be encouraged to do good things
this kind of behavior won’t last long
someday they will realize the truth
if they can, they will be good people no matter how the story ends
